#!/bin/bash
if [ -s "/Applications/Microsoft Word.app" ]; then
check_office_version=$(defaults read "/Applications/Microsoft Word.app/Contents/Info.plist" CFBundleShortVersionString)
version_minor=$(echo ${check_office_version} | cut -d. -f2) version_major=$(echo ${check_office_version} | cut -d. -f1) version_revision=$(echo ${check_office_version} | cut -d. -f3)
if [ ${version_major} -eq 15 ]; then echo "<result>Microsoft Office 2016</result>" && exit 0 fi
if [ ${version_major} -eq 16 ]; then if [ ${version_minor} -ge 17 ]; then echo "<result>Microsoft Office 2019</result>" else echo "<result>Microsoft Office 2016</result>" fi fi
elif [ -s "/Applications/Microsoft Office 2011/Microsoft Word.app" ]; then echo "<result>Microsoft Office 2011</result>" else echo "<result>Microsoft Office Not Installed</result>" fi
